item.title: Negative Lookahead in Prometheus Relabel Config
item.description:
Prometheus is written in Go and uses RE2 and that does not support negative lookahead. From convenience perspective, its easier to write human-readable regex using that, but as its not supported, we’ll see a workaround for that.

Say for example, you have a label my_label and you’d like to relabel all the label values to custom_value where it contains my_value but only when it does not contain foobar.
